[[Lambert-Meadowlands Trophy|Eastern Champions]] | BowlTourney = | BowlTourneyResult = }} The '''1937 Pittsburgh Panthers football team''' represented the [[University of Pittsburgh]] in the 1937 college football season. The Panthers were crowned National Champions. Pitt was also awarded the [[Lambert-Meadowlands Trophy]] as the champion of the [[Northeastern United States|East]]. Pitt declined an invitation to the [[Rose Bowl Game|Rose Bowl]] at the end of the season. == Schedule == *In the [[Backyard Brawl]], Pittsburgh defeated West Virginia by a score of 20-0.
